verbs.description: Trump [V: has] created a brand new , self - imposed international security crisis that could very well get worse before it gets better .
[ARG0: Trump] has [V: created] [ARG1: a brand new , self - imposed international security crisis that could very well get worse before it gets better] .
Trump has created a brand new , [ARG2: self] - [V: imposed] [ARG1: international security crisis] that could very well get worse before it gets better .
Trump has created a brand new , self - imposed international security crisis that [V: could] very well get worse before it gets better .
Trump has created [ARG1: a brand new , self - imposed international security crisis] [R-ARG1: that] [ARGM-MOD: could] [ARGM-ADV: very well] [V: get] [ARG2: worse] [ARGM-TMP: before it gets better] .
Trump has created a brand new , self - imposed international security crisis that could very well get worse before [ARG1: it] [V: gets] [ARG2: better] .
